about_the_game:
Survive

You will take care of a community of survivors, as you gather resources and explore the ruins of the world. Every time you die during a match, you will have two options: abandon the mission and lose your loot, or respawn and recover your loot at the price of losing one survivor from your community. The survival of your community depends on you, but you won’t survive without them. If they don’t survive, you will lose your main character for good.

The Weather

The weather will affect you and your enemies. A cloudy sky will reduce the firing capacity of your weapons, but rain will naturally slow down your enemies. Fog will reduce your ability to detect the enemies around you, but a clear sky will make you more powerful than them. Plan your strategy and survive the weather.

The enemies

The strange radioactive organisms that have infested the world are naturally invisible. Your technology forces them to become visible when they are inside an electric field that surrounds you. They also are highly radioactive, so eliminate them before they get too close to you. Some of them have the capacity to increase your levels of fear. Maintain low levels of fear, because it will affect your shooting skills.

Your Weapons

Your weapons are capable of using two types of ammunition. Solar Ammunition and Oxygen Ammunition. The first one requires you to be directly under the sunlight to use its full power, while the second one will reduce your evasive abilities as it uses the same oxygen you need to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9750H CPU 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Max-Q
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9750H CPU 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Borealis Descent is a horror-survival extraction Third Person Shooter placed in a post-apocalyptic solarpunk world, where a mysterious organism has contaminated the planet’s atmosphere, making it impossible for humanity to breathe.
